title: Venus in Taurus
summary: Affection slows down and seeks stability. Pleasure leans toward comfort, reliability, and tangible expressions of care. The opportunity is to savor and invest in what feels lasting.

meaning.headline: Connection values steadiness, simplicity, and sensual grounding.

frames.text: Venus in Taurus emphasizes loyalty, consistency, and enjoyment of physical or material comforts.
Relationships benefit from showing up reliably rather than dramatically.
Taste and values lean toward quality and practicality.
Small rituals of care become meaningful.
Comfort means nothing needs to change or be addressed.

frictions: Attachment to routines that need updating
Overindulgence in food, spending, or rest
opportunities: Investing in durable goods or experiences

do: Budget for pleasures you truly value.
Invite steady routines that support connection.
Notice when comfort is restorative versus avoidant.
avoid: Ignoring partner feedback to keep peace

reusable_lines.text: Consistency and care speak louder than rush or spectacle.
Savor what feels solid while staying open to needed adjustments.

forbidden_claims: Predictions of financial or romantic outcomes
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can encourage steadiness and appreciation
Agency-forward language: you choose how to invest and share
Contextual framing: comfort helps when it is conscious

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
